fno: Turnover on the National Stock Exchange's futures & options (F&O) segment was Rs 337.55 lakh crore compared with Rs 170.03 lakh crore reported in the previous session. In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 21.75 points or 0.12% to settle at 17,893.45. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, declined 4.08% to 13.04. Adani Enterprises, Adani Ports and Special Economic Zone and Reliance Industries were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The February 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 23 February 2023.
